entry.title: libbitcoin
entry.summary: The provided context is a message that directs the reader to check out a forum link, http://forum.bitcoin.org/index.php?topic=30646.0, for posting questions instead of sending emails. The sender mentions that they do not frequently check their email. It is important to note that the forum link is likely related to Bitcoin given its URL. This message serves as a reminder to individuals seeking assistance or information on Bitcoin-related topics to utilize forums, where community members can provide valuable insights and answers to questions. It also highlights the importance of checking communication channels regularly to ensure prompt responses.
